A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The story was predictable and not very engaging. The bad guys were super dumb and the good guys were super humanly lucky. Characters were tossed aside and killed off with semi casually. The story had rehashed elements of Empire and a New Hope with rehashed results. The story developed really slowly and made the first half borderline boring. Major plotlines from #7 were left unresolved. With that said\, the visuals were stunning\, they managed to bring elements of cute to the movie without drowning us in it (aka Jar Jar or the Ewoks). This movie missed the mark. It feels like Disney ringing the Star Wars cash register rather than making a movie that connects with fans and moves the overall story along.
